version_description:
． It's now possible to handwrite or draw inside your notes
． Attachments can now be added directly from your DiskStation or other cloud providers via the Document Provider (requires iOS 8)
The following features require Note Station 1.1:

． Cr

． Fixed an issue where using the web clipper would result in a failure due to an unfounded lack of permissions
． Minor bug fixes and improvements

． Notes can now be sent via email apps
． Added a Today widget
． DS note can now refresh periodically in the background (intervals determined arbitrarily by the iOS system)
． The font size can be set at the settings page
． Password changes are

． 64-bit support for better performances
． Fixed an issue where thumbnails of inline images wouldn't display
． Fixed an issue where deleting notebooks containing notes without tags may crash the app
． Fixed an issue where tables created in Note S

． Internal note link is supported to open another note directly via hyperlink (Note Station 1.5-0338 or above required)
． Smart notebook is supported to sort notes according to search criteria automatically (Note Station 1.5-0338 or above required)
． Fixed an issue where DS note couldn't be launched in iOS 8.0 - 8.2

． Users can add stars, subtasks, and remark to to-do tasks
． Notes and notebooks can be shared with DSM groups
． Users can search for attachment contents in DS note
． Your mobile device can be remembered to avoid repeated password entry for 2-ste

． Supports searching into note contents in DS note via the native search function of iOS 9
． Fixed an issue where the editing window for to-do tasks might be too small on iPad (iOS 8 and iOS 9)
． Fixed an issue where thumbnails of the same notes mig

． Fixed an issue where DS note uploaded original images rather than edited versions
． Fixed an issue where creating smart notebooks might fail if the notebook criterion was specified
． Fixed an issue where DS note might crash after update from versi

． Added support for nested tags for note management (Note Station 2.1.0 or above required)
． Added the "Intersect selected" option for advanced search by tag (Note Station 2.1.0 or above required)
． Enhanced performance of to-do tasks
． Fixed an
． Fixed an issue where connection might be unstable after upgrade to iOS 10

．Supports Split View on specific iPad models (iOS 9 and above required)
．Supports passcode lock and Touch ID to protect user privacy
．Supports selecting and copying note text in the view mode
．Allows non-owner users to add notes to shared noteboo

- Enhanced the security of login information
- Minor bug fixes

- Enhanced format compatibility on iOS 11 by adding support for converting HEIF images to JPEGs during image insertion
- Minor bug fixes

1. Supports precise search, which only returns note titles, content, and attachment names that are exact matches of your keyword as results when you place the keyword inside double quotation marks
2. Supports full-screen display on iPhone X
3.

1. Optimized interface display for iPhone XS Max
2. Fixed an issue where it might crash when using Touch ID on iPhone X
3. Minor bugs fixes

1. Fixed an issue where in-note photos might fail to be saved to iPhone albums
2. Fixed an issue where text might fail to be selected in the editing mode
3. Minor bugs fixes
Updated Synology's terms and conditions for EU data privacy compliance.

1. Supports Thai user interface
2. Fixed an issue where Smart Notebooks might fail to be shared
3. Fixed an issue where the content of notes might disappear after restoring to earlier versions
4. Fixed an issue the creation time of notes might be

1. Supports Thai user interface
2. Fixed an issue where Smart Notebooks might fail to be shared
3. Fixed an issue where the content of notes might disappear after restoring to earlier versions
4. Fixed an issue the creation time of notes might be

1. Optimized interface display for iPhone XS Max
2. Fixed an issue where it might crash when using Touch ID on iPhone X
3. Minor bugs fixes

1. Optimized display on the new iPad Pro and iPhone XR
2. Fixed lagging issue when users type multiple lines of text
3. Fixed an issue where users might not be able to input Chinese correctly
4. Minor bug fixes

Fixed Issues
1. Fixed the issue where the application might quit unexpectedly upon login.
2. Minor bug fixes.
